Purpose: To confirm and quantify barbiturates in urine specimens under chain of custody conditions, ensuring accurate, precise, and legally defensible results.
Container: Chain of custody urine container with tamper-evident seal
Equipment: Gas or Liquid Chromatograph-Mass Spectrometer (GC-MS or LC-MS/MS), calibrated pipettes, vortex mixer, centrifuge, analytical balance, refrigerator/freezer
